cmd.cmdEffect: What is this command's effect. Does it create a dir, change a GUI etc.
cmd.cmdReturnValue: What does the command return in pass and fail cases
cmd.cmdGUICommand: What is the equivalent GUI command for this Tcl command

arg.argMultiples: Can this arg be called multiples times

argFormat.argType: Data type of the argument: string, boolean
argFormat.argDependsOn: Does this command depend on any other command
argFormat.argEffect: What is this arg's effect. Does it enable a checkbox, pop-up a window etc.
